info.title: Central Request for Quotation
info.description: This service enables you to read, update, delete and create central request for quotation from an external system in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system. The service contains header, item, bidder and item distribution. The information is sent in the request as a payload. All information is utilized when creating a central RFQ with appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations.

x-sap-shortText: Read, update, create and delete central request for quotation from an external system in SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this synchronous service

values.text: SAP S/4HANA Procurement Hub - Central Request For Quotation Integration(SAP_COM_0736)
